Author: __peewee
Text: One thing i noticed is, when i binge eat, it motivates me to restrict 10x harder the next day/week. The more I do it the easier it gets to go even longer without binging.   anyways, don’t be too hard on yourself. you can’t purge every calorie so obsessing over it is essentially useless. Just use how you feel right now as fuel to make better choices in the future.
